attributes.action: To authorise the use of water cannons to be at the disposal of the police.
attributes.additional_details:
2011 Riots in London: 1 death, 186 police officers injured, 10 firefighters injured, 3 police support officers injured. Overall 100 million pounds of damage!
2015 Lambeth disorder : 14 police officers and a police dog injured.
attributes.background: With increasing cuts in budgets, the apparent increase in violence and assaults on police at various events / public order situations & damage to public property, it is requested that the availability of water cannons to police services to be used as required on the approval of the chief constable.
